verses.name: 2 Kings 18:13
verses.text: Now in the fourteenth year of king Hezekiah did Sennacherib king of Assyria come up against all the fenced cities of Judah, and took them.

verses.name: 2 Kings 18:14
verses.text: And Hezekiah king of Judah sent to the king of Assyria to Lachish, saying, I have offended; return from me: that which thou puttest on me will I bear. And the king of Assyria appointed unto Hezekiah king of Judah three hundred talents of silver and thirty talents of gold.

verses.name: 2 Kings 18:15
verses.text: And Hezekiah gave him all the silver that was found in the house of the Lord, and in the treasures of the king’s house.
